# IRISUtils

```{r, echo = FALSE, results='asis', message=FALSE,eval=TRUE}
cat(
  badger::badge_devel("Ehyaei/IRISUtils", "orange"),
  badger::badge_lifecycle("experimental"),
  badger::badge_last_commit("Ehyaei/IRISUtils")

```

The goal of IRISUtils is to collect and organise scripts that are frequently used in our lab projects.

## Installation

You can install the development version of IRISUtils like so:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("Ehyaei/IRISUtils")
```
